info.title: Badhan API
info.description: Automatically generated documentation of Badhan API. The backend is documented and currently maintained by Sumaiya Azad

tags.name: Public Contacts
tags.description: Contacts of Badhan that are available to the public

post.description: handles the insertion of a new donor into the database.

message.example: Donor found with duplicate phone number in another hall

409.description: If the donor with same phone number already exists in the database with another hall name, user will get the error message

get.description: handles the fetching of donor details.

404.description: When no donor with the specified donor id is found, user will get this error message

delete.description: handles the deletion of an existing donor from the database.

message.example: You cannot modify the details of a Badhan member with higher designation

403.description: This middleware is used to block the manipulation of data of a member with higher designation

404.description: When no donor with the specified donor id is found, user will get this error message

get.description: Handles the fetching of own details.

200.description: Info of the logged in user

get.description: Searches for donors that matches the filters

parameters.name: availableToAll
parameters.description: availableToAll denotes the availability of the donor to the other hall members

message.example: You are not allowed to search donors of other halls

403.description: This error will occur if the user tries to search other halls

patch.description: Adds a comment to a donors profile.

200.description: In case of successfully saving the comment

404.description: When no donor with the specified donor id is found, user will get this error message

post.description: Request for password reset link for a user

message.example: Successfully created recovery link for user

200.description: Successfully created recovery link for user

message.example: You cannot modify the details of a Badhan member with higher designation

403.description: This middleware is used to block the manipulation of data of a member with higher designation

404.description: When no donor with the specified donor id is found, user will get this error message

message.example: Donor is not a volunteer/ admin

409.description: Donor is not a volunteer/ admin

patch.description: Handles the update of donor information.

message.example: You do not have permission to edit email address of another user

403.description: You do not have permission to edit email address of another user

patch.description: Handles the promotion or demotion of users.

parameters.name: promote
parameters.description: If the user wants to promote the target donor, promoteFlag should be true and a new password is needed to be set. If the target donor needs to be demoted, the promoteFlag should be false.

403.description: This error will appear if anyone below the designation of hall admin tries to access this route. This middleware assumes that the handleHallPermission middleware is used before and along with this middleware

404.description: When no donor with the specified donor id is found, user will get this error message

message.example: Can not promote volunteer or can not demote donor/ Donor does not have a valid hall

409.description: If user cannot promote volunteer or cannot demote donor/ Donor does not have a valid hall

get.description: Request get list of volunteers of own hall, all hall admins and super admins
Check whether phone number already exists

200.description: If the phone number does not exist in database

get.description: Handles the fetching of volunteer lists for a hall admin.

200.description: An array of volunteers fetched successfully

patch.description: Promotes a volunteer to hall admin and demotes the existing hall admin to volunteer

404.description: When no donor with the specified donor id is found, user will get this error message

409.description: If fetched user is not a volunteer , user will get this error message

get.description: handles the fetching of hall admin list for a super admin.

parameters.name: signIn
parameters.description: Phone number of a logging user.

201.description: A successful sign in returns a token for the user

401.description: When the user provides an invalid password

message.example: You do not have an account

404.description: When the logging user does not have any account

200.description: A successful sign out removes the token for the user

delete.description: Endpoint to logout user from all devices.

message.example: Logged out from all devices successfully

200.description: A successful sign out removes all the tokens of the user

post.description: Endpoint to request a temporary redirection token

patch.description: Route endpoint to redirect user from app to web.

401.description: This error will occur if the jwt token is invalid

404.description: This error will occur if the token does not exist

post.description: Route if user forgets the password.

parameters.name: signIn
parameters.description: Phone number of user who forgot his/her password

message.example: A recovery mail has been sent to your email address
Phone number not recognized/ Account not found/ No recovery email found for this phone number

delete.description: Endpoint to delete a login from device

parameters.name: tokenId
parameters.description: ID of token to be deleted

404.description: Token with specified ID was not found in database

post.description: Endpoint to insert a call record

parameters.name: CallRecordObject
parameters.description: Contains the donor id of callee

404.description: When no donor with the specified donor id is found, user will get this error message

delete.description: handles the deletion of one call history for a particular donor.

parameters.name: donorId
parameters.description: Id of donor for call history

parameters.name: callRecordId
parameters.description: Id of call record that is going to be deleted

404.description: This error occurs if the call record does not exist

message.example: Target donor does not have the callee of call record

409.description: This error occurs if the call record does not associate with the target donor

post.description: Endpoint to insert a donation date for a donor

404.description: When no donor with the specified donor id is found, user will get this error message

delete.description: handles the deletion of a donation for a donor.

get.description: Get app info deployed to play store

200.description: response is the current version number of badhan api

get.description: Get app info deployed to play store

200.description: response is the current version number of badhan api

get.description: Fetch statistics about the current donor count and volunteer count
Get api call details of a donor by date

message.example: Logs fetched by user and date

get.description: Get user-wise api call counts for specific date
Get date wise count of api calls

post.description: Endpoint to insert a public contact

parameters.name: PublicContactObject
parameters.description: Contains the donor id and assigned blood group of contact

409.description: If contactId in database does not have the matching donorId
